context: Do you have any idea who Ravichandran Ashwin is?
He is a cricket player from Chennai India, are you a cricket fan?
No, I am not but I am from Chennai and good to know that some of good Indian cricketers come from Chennai, India. Is he a good player?
Yes, he is an excellent player, did you know know about Yuvraj Singh, he is great too!
Yes, I have heard about and his wins in the Indian team. He belongs to the Pune Warriors India and I believe he has also starred in a film called Jumbo an Animation film. did you know that?
resp: I heard about that, did you know he also had a role in Slumdog Millionaire? Have you seen that movie?

context.content: "PS, I Love You" is a romantic drama film that follows the story of a young widow who discovers that her late husband has left her a series of letters to help her cope with his death and move on with her life. While it has emotional and heartwarming moments, it also includes lighthearted and comedic elements, making it a well-rounded and touching movie.

The movie combines lighthearted comedy with heartwarming moments and explores themes of friendship and relationships, making it a great choice for your preferences.
